# datavyur <a href="https://databrary.github.io/datavyur"></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- [![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/databraryr)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=databraryr) -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

datavyur is package for interacting with coding files generated by the [Datavyu](https://datavyu.org) application.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# The development release can be installed from GitHub
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("databrarydatavyur")
```

## Usage

```{r example}
library(databraryr)

get_db_stats()

list_volume_assets() |> 
  head()
```

## Lifecycle

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html)

The package is under active development.
